Container.Name: syslog-ng
Container.Overview: syslog-ng(https://www.syslog-ng.com/products/open-source-log-management/) allows you to flexibly collect, parse, classify, rewrite and correlate logs from across your infrastructure and store or route them to log analysis tools.
